description: Supply of tire and tube, pneumatic aircraft CC130
duration_in_months: I am perplexed by the unclear phrasing used in the duration of the contract. The provided text states that the duration is from “(2022-10-11) to (2023-03-31)”, but this is considered after contract is supposed to commence. Thus, it seems like a contract duration already coming to an end. Multiple inconvenient info.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

full_summary:
### Tire, Pneumatic, Aircraft CC130
#### Solicitation Title
 Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of pneumatic tires for the CC130 aircraft. 

#### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237098/B
* **Publication Date**: September 26, 2022
* **Solicitation Closing Date**: October 11, 2022 at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Duration**: [Three years], October 11, 2022 to March 31, 2023
* **Delivery Location**: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Montreal 

#### Contracting Details
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Purchase Type**: Competitive Procurement
* **Trade Agreements**: The Solicitation is open to suppliers who are eligible under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other trade agreements listed below:
+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Documents
The solicitation documents are available for download from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) in English and French. Particular attention is drawn to sections on bid preparation, bid submission, evaluation criteria, and contract award.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or information, please contact:

Lebel Danny
Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
 Postal Address: CA

### Attachment
A digitally signed PDF version of this solicitation document is available for download from Canada Buys.

### Languages of Communication
English and French are the official languages of communication of the Government of Canada. Suppliers may use either or both official languages when submitting their proposals or communicating with the Government.

### Access and Participation
All qualified and eligible suppliers are encouraged to participate in the procurement process. As stated in Tender Notice Language, text must be non-derogatory and genuine captions must not be corrected in a damaging manner or altered in a consistently unseen loss. Government Property shall serve full duration stipulated within Purchase Notice on whatsoever shall resolve repairors appropriates loss complete liability provided in para above. We shall presume shoulder standing contract via written
